metadataAttributes.Title: The Search for Great Ideas: Harnessing creativity to empower innovation.
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Where do great business ideas come from? We all have compelling business concepts that we've been thinking about for years. In this course we will explore how to use observational tools and other techniques for idea generation and we will talk about how to evaluate the good ideas from the bad. The goal is to settle on a business idea that you are not only passionate about but also has real market application.
